column4: I know when I need to kill a firefox session cause it's stuck, I issue sudo killall firefix-bin, so maybe to start it use, firefox-bin. but first kill the firefox command
/ John_R : Okay, this is a new one. :P   I umounted /export (NFS) a couple of days ago.  It's not in /etc/mtab, and Yes, I *have* umounted it.  For some reason, pwd finds this dir, and hangs on it.
